collection:
This Privacy
Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and protection of
your personal data when you use our Forex plugin for Chat-GPT.

Data Collection and Use** Forex-GPT.ai collects only essential
information for service provision, including your name and email address
during sign-up.

We do not record or store user
queries or responses within our plugin and custom GPTs, except for chart
parameters and time-frames requested from our API providers for chart
generation.

[Forex-GPT.ai: AI-Driven Forex Analysis with
ForexGPT](https://i0.wp.com/forex-gpt.ai/wp-
content/uploads/2023/05/logo-1.jpg?fit=982%2C982&ssl=1)](https://forex-
gpt.ai/)

Manage Cookie Consent

To provide the best experience, we use technologies like cookies to store
and/or access device information.

Consenting to these technologies will allow
us to process data such as browsing behavior or unique IDs on this site.

Marketing Marketing

The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send
advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for
similar marketing purposes.
